text: @cnni Hmm. If #Trump is taking #Hydroxychloroquine which is anti malaria medication, then it means that he is sick with #COVID19 or he is acting irresponsibly by taking such medication without doctor's orders. American public must know what's going on with health of #US president.

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
